Location.Description: You are standing in the entrance to a dark cave known as the Silent Caverns. The path in is hard to see, or at least it would be if it weren't for various camping gear, empty cans and wrappers from locals and visitors who have also heard of the landmark and have come to explore. How many have returned? Probably all of them, as it looks as though there was a partial collapse just slightly into the thin winding tunnel that leads into the shadows beyond. But closer inspection shows a faint handprint that glows with arcane energy as you draw close; lightly pressing your palm against it makes the rocks shimmer away, nothing more than an illusion to keep out common explorers. You stand at the entrance, feeling a breeze pass by you, first sucked into the cave and then back out as the air pressure stabilizes, though it leaves the impression that the cave itself is alive and breathing...
